results.headline: STELLA DALLAS (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Stella Dallas

results.summary_short: Factory-town girl snubbed by wealthy husband's social circle. Superb Stanwyck-Shirley trouping makes it glow still.

results.headline: HARD TO KILL (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Hard to Kill

results.summary_short: Vengeful cop wakes up from coma. Of this genre, not bad.

results.headline: STANLEY AND IRIS (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Stanley and Iris

results.summary_short: Factory town love story with literacy message. Honest, direct and entertaining.

results.headline: LOOSE CANNONS (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Loose Cannons

results.summary_short: Washington buddy- cops, guns, gags. A few funny ideas but sloppily handled.

results.headline: NEW YEAR'S DAY (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of New Year's Day

results.summary_short: Three women and a fellow from L.A. celebrate in a rented N.Y. apartment, via Henry Jaglom. Crashing bore.

results.headline: HOMER AND EDDIE (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Homer and Eddie

results.summary_short: Sweet dimwit and dying, homicidal woman. Strikeout.

results.headline: TIME OF THE GYPSIES (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Time of the Gypsies

results.summary_short: Telekinetic Gypsy teenager joins a band of thieves on the outskirts of his Yugoslav village. Meandering and self-conscious.

results.headline: TORRENTS OF SPRING (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Torrents of Spring

results.summary_short: Turgenev's passionate triangle, and not so hot. Like a laboriously translated U.N. meeting.

results.headline: HEART CONDITION (MOVIE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Heart Condition

results.summary_short: Cop gets transplanted heart of his enemy, a black lawyer. Clumsy and unfunny buddy film.

results.headline: FLASHBACK (MOVIE)

results.summary_short: Flower child of the 60's confronts 80's conservative. Engaging caper till it splinters.
